entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7 except 12 inland. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 7 except 12 inland. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
